text: Joseph Edward Brennan (November 2, 1934 - April 5, 2024) was an American Democratic Party politician from Maine. He served as the 70th Governor of Maine from 1979 to 1987. He is a former commissioner on the Federal Maritime Commission. Brennan died at his home in Portland, Maine on April 6, 2024, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Governors of Maine Category:People from Portland, Maine Category:United States representatives from Maine Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Joseph E. Brennan
